div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1683 Alexandria environs, 1908 (34) Burial: c. 250 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 4 AR, ? AE Ptolemy II: 4 tetradr. (Tyre, yr. 30 = 256 B.C.; Sidon, yr. 31 = 255 B.C.) Unspecified AE Disposition: Eddé; Avierino Eddé, RassNum. 1909, p. 55 Regling, ZfN 1931, p. 28 Regling regards the Lampsacus gold of Noe 34 as a separate hd. (see no. 1655 above)
